name: Beautiful Picture Puzzle Free
description:
A stunning picture has been splitted into pieces, can you solve the puzzle getting all the pieces in the right places?



Beautiful Picture Puzzle is a free attention training game for all ages.

Sit back and relax, get all pieces together and reveal the beautiful picture! Be quick — the time is limited!



Features:

• Countless gorgeous puzzle pictures are ready to be explored by you.

• It starts very easy but gets challenging quickly.

• The less time you spend on solving the puzzle the more coins you get.

• Change coins to diamonds and pay by them for "difficult" pictures.

• Single and friend game modes.

• Intuitive interface

• Relaxing background music

• View collection of finished pictures.

• Share your favorite puzzle pictures to your friends on Facebook or Google.
